net.java.truevfs.kernel.spec

Class FsAbstractNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.java.truecommons.shed.UniqueObject
      • net.java.truevfs.kernel.spec.FsAbstractNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.java.truecommons.cio.Entry, FsNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FsCovariantNode, HttpNode

    public abstract class FsAbstractNode
extends net.java.truecommons.shed.UniqueObject
implements FsNode
    An abstract file system node is a node which can implement multiple types and list directory members.
    Since:
    TrueVFS 0.10
    Author:
    Christian Schlichtherle
